ygData.subject: Thanks for the laughs
ygData.msgSnippet: I want to thank all the people posting the great stories today, I really needed a good laugh.  I have no great story myself to add (as I was running all over
ygData.messageBody:
I want to thank all the people posting the great stories today, I really
needed a good laugh. I have no great story myself to add (as I was running
all over Tunaria last night looking for medium quality animal skins to
practice tailoring on). But I did hear a funny joke in West Karana:
A guy kills a named Barbarian in WK and shouts out "What is a barbarian head
good for?"
Someone answers, "Nothing, they do not even use them."

Keep up the great stories everyone!

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
